animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I quack and waddle, and love to swim in a pond. What am I?
I bark and wag my tail, and love to fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🐕 I am a man's best friend.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can use my trunk to spray water.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.

animal.question: I moo and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 My milk is used to make cheese.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?
I roar and I'm known as the King of the Jungle. What am I?
I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I have strong legs for jumping.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
🌿 My favourite food is acacia leaves.

animal.question: I can change colors to blend in with my surroundings. What am I?

bug.question: I have six legs and I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow and black.

bug.question: I build big hills and I'm always working with my friends. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I can lift things many times my size.
🐜 I am very small but very strong.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and I used to be a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I love to land on flowers.
🐛 I start as something very different.

bug.question: I jump very high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 You might hear me in a field.

bug.question: I am a beetle with bright red wings and black spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 People say I bring good luck.
🐞 My name includes a type of woman.
🔴 I am red with black dots.

bug.question: I fly at night and light up the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 You only see me when it's dark.
💡 My light helps people see in the dark.

bug.question: I can walk on water and have long, thin legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 I look like I am walking on a pond.
⛸️ My weight is distributed to allow this behaviour.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🎣 I trap flies in my web.

bug.question: I hatch from an egg and eat leaves as a larva, and then I sleep in a chrysalis to change. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat a lot of leaves when young.
😴 My sleeping stage is called a pupa or chrysalis.
🦋 I become beautiful after my long sleep.

bug.question: I drink blood and leave itchy bites. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be annoying at night.
🔴 I leave small red bumps on your skin.
💉 I use a small needle to take blood.
